name: Denise Merrill
tweet: “We need even more federal assistance for state and local election officials,” he added.

name: Denise Merrill
tweet: Going forward, Bates said, “We don’t have the resources we had in 2020. Congress, I would suggest, needs to put resources back to the states again so that we can make these kinds of partnerships happen.”

name: Denise Merrill
tweet: “In 2020 we used some of our federal resources from the Help America Vote Act to get assistance to the towns,” Bates said. “We worked with the Connecticut National Guard to make sure every town in Connecticut had an opportunity to do a cybersecurity audit.”
